name: Ash_Fall
display_help: You create a powerful lightning storm at your target's location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.

name: Curse
display_help: You place a curse on your target, darkening their soul and weakening their body. The target suffers energy and negative energy damage, as well as a reduction in their combat speed, chance to hit, range and healing effectiveness.
display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG (Energy), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), -RES(Heal,Foe), -Rech(Foe), -ToHit(Foe), -Range(Foe)

name: Condemnation
display_help: You speak words of condemnation while coalescing a mass of dark energy between your hands. When complete, you hurl this mass at your target, striking them with the full fury of your words. The target suffers energy and negative energy damage, and may be terrified by the force of your condemnation.
display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Moderate DMG(Energy), Minor DoT (Negative Energy), Chance for Fear(Foe)

name: Castigation
display_help: You speak vicious words of castigation at the opponents arrayed before you. These words have a debilitating effect on the morale of afflicted targets. In addition to sustaining negative energy and energy damage, your targets suffer from reduced regeneration, recovery, defense and resistance.
display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG(Energy), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), -Regen(Foe), -Rec(Foe), -Def(Foe,All), -Res(Foe, All)

name: Lamentation
display_help: You cry out in a sorrowful lamentation, causing energy and negative energy damage in those around you. There is a chance that your lamentations affect your enemy so deeply that you may feed upon their suffering, healing yourself and increasing the endurance cost of their powers.
display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG(Energy), Moderate DoT(Negative Energy), -DMG(Foe,All), Chance for Heal(Self) and +EndCost(Foe)

name: Blizzard
display_help: All enemies within the blizzard suffer continuous lethal and cold damage and reductions in their movement speed and recharge rate.

name: Snow
display_help: All enemies within the blizzard suffer continuous lethal and cold damage and reductions in their movement speed and recharge rate.

name: Boon_of_Death
display_help: Boon of Death heals you and your allies over time.

name: Charge
display_help: You have been struck by chain lightning.

name: Charge
display_help: You have been struck by chain lightning.

name: Charge
display_help: You have been struck by chain lightning.

name: Blazing_Arrow
display_help: You fire a Blazing Arrow at your foe, dealing some Lethal damage and causing them to catch on fire and burn.

name: Ice_Arrow
display_help: This arrow can freeze a single foe in a block of ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be held, but all affected targets will be slowed.

name: Seasons_End
display_help: You draw a blade of ice and a blade of flame and unleash a quick succession of strikes at your target. While the attacks are so fast that the target is unable to catch fire, they suffer a tremendous burst of damage and have a chance to be knockdown with the final blows.

name: Winters_Hearth
display_help: You immobilize your target in a field of ice which focuses energy in such a way that it also sets them on fire. While immobilized, the target cannot be knocked back, but when freed they suffer from reduced movement and attack speed.
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Cold, Minor DoT(Fire), Immobilize (Foe), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), -Fly(Foe)

name: Seasonal_Shift
display_help: You rapidly draw in an immense amount of energy from the outer reaches of a 30' radius around you, igniting it in a fiery burst. The region within 15' of you burns, causing fire damage and reduction in chance to hit on enemy targets, while the region between 15' and 30' of you freezes, causing cold damage and reducing enemy targets' movement and attack speeds.
display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DoT (Fire or Cold), Special

name: Harvest_Blades
display_help: You draw a blade of ice and a blade of flame and slash your target. The fire blade deals fire damage and sets the target ablaze, while the intense chill of the ice blade deals cold damage and will slow a target's movement and attack speed.
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Fire/Cold), Minor DoT(Fire), -Speed(Foe, All), -Recharge(Foe)

name: Autumnal_Equinox
display_help: Calling on the strength of the seasons, you concentrate both ice and fire on your target. The target is held in a block of ice and is unable to move while they cook inside the block.
display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Cold), Minor DoT (Fire), Hold(Foe), -Speed(Foe, All), -Rech(Foe)

name: Antipodal_Strike
display_help: You draw a blade of ice and a blade of flame, striking your target with both in quick succession. The fire blade deals fire and lethal damage and sets the target ablaze, while the intense chill of the ice blade deals cold and lethal damage and will slow a target's movement and attack speed.

name: Earthquake_Master
display_help: You create a localized earthquake at your target's current location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.

name: Earthquake
display_help: The violent shaking of the earthquake deals smashing damage and knocks down targets caught in its area. Additionally, because of debris thrown into the air, nearby flying characters can be knocked to the ground.

name: Earthquake_Debuff
display_help: The violent shaking of the earthquake leaves a cloud of dust and debris in the air. This reduces your chance to hit, slows movement and attack speeds and prevents flight.

name: Spin
display_help: You spin around in a circle, attacking everyone within melee range with a Strike attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Weaken
display_help: You poison a single foe and significantly weaken her strength. The affected target's chance to hit, attack strength and the status effect potency are all reduced.

name: Initial
display_help: You call forth a powerful stream of lightning from the highest reaches of the atmosphere. This Flow Lightning causes significant energy damage to all enemies caught in its field, as well as drains endurance and lowers recovery.
display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Extreme DMG (Energy), -End (Foe), -Rec (Foe), +DMG(Self, Energy), +DEF(Self, Energy)

name: Ongoing
display_help: You call forth a powerful stream of lightning from the highest reaches of the atmosphere. This Flow Lightning causes significant energy damage to all enemies caught in its field, as well as drains endurance and lowers recovery.
display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Extreme DMG (Energy), -End (Foe), -Rec (Foe), +DMG(Self, Energy), +DEF(Self, Energy)

name: Slash
display_help: You perform a quick slash that deals lethal damage and can reduce a target's defense.

name: Hack
display_help: You hack your opponent for a high amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's defense.

name: Throwing_Knives
display_help: You throw a sharpened dagger at your target.

name: Savage_Slice
display_help: You perform a powerful maneuver that deals a great amount of damage and can knock a target up into the air. This attack can reduce a target's defense.

name: Savage_Strike
display_help: You perform a devastating attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce its defense.

name: Sirens_Song
display_help: You send forth a deadly song which causes your foes to fall unconscious and take some minor damage. Your foes will remain unconscious for a good while, but will waken if disturbed.

name: Fearsome_Stare
display_help: You gaze instills terror in your enemies, causing them fear and reducing their chance to hit.

name: Petrifying_Gaze
display_help: Your target is turned to stone by your gaze.

name: Screech
display_help: You unleash a hyper-frequency screech which deafens your targets, causing smashing and energy damage and stunning your target.

name: Snap_Shot
display_help: A quick attack that fires an arrow at your foe after only minimal aiming. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Aimed_Shot
display_help: You slash your foe with your claws, dealing a moderate amount of Lethal damage and reducing the target's defenses. This has a longer recharge than Swipe. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Entangling_Arrow
display_help: Upon impact, the Entangling Arrow releases a strong net that can immobilize most targets, though they are not prevented from attacking. The Entangling Arrow can bring down flying entities and limits movement.

name: Morbid_Cut
display_help: You perform a quick slash that deals lethal damage and can reduce a target's defense.

name: Morbid_Hack
display_help: You hack your opponent for a high amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's defense.

name: Circle_of_Death
display_help: You hack your opponent for a high amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's defense.

name: Boon_of_Death
display_help: You channel death energy through yourself to a targeted foe. Boon of Death drains life energy from the target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's chance to hit, damage and regeneration rate are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed.

name: Enervating_Bolt
display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and slows her attacks and movement for a time.

name: Deadly_Blast
display_help: Shadow Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing their chance to hit.

name: Deaths_Embrace
display_help: Calling on the strength of the seasons, you concentrate both ice and fire on your target. The target is held in a block of ice and is unable to move while they cook inside the block.
display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG(Cold), Moderate DMG (Fire, DoT), Foe Hold, -SPD, -Recharge

name: Fearsome_Stare
display_help: You gaze instills terror in your enemies, causing them fear and reducing their chance to hit.

name: Maddening_Bolt
display_help: You fire a bolt of pure madness at your target, causing psionic damage and lowering the target's attack speed.

name: Monstrous_Scream
display_help: You unleash a fearsome howl which infects the minds of all those who hear it. The affected targets suffer psionic damage and a reduced chance to hit.

name: Monstrous_Wail
display_help: You unleash a dreadful wail which infects the minds of all those who hear it. The affected targets suffer psionic damage and are knocked off their feet. There is a chance that an affected target will also be stunned briefly.
display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG(Psionic), Knockback(Foe), Chance for Stun(Foe)

name: Debilitating_Venom
display_help: You fire toxic quills at your target. These cause lethal damage on impact and inject a toxin that causes toxic damage over time while also lowering defenses. The toxins can stiffen muscles, holding the target in place.
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Lethal), DoT(Toxic), -DEF(Foe, All), Chance for Hold(Foe)

name: Dreadful_Venom
display_help: You fire toxic quills at your target. These cause lethal damage on impact and inject a toxin that causes toxic damage over time. The toxins can reduce strength, causing each action a target takes to cost more endurance.

name: Exhausting_Venom
display_help: You envenom your foe with a powerful poison. This poison deals only minor toxic damage, but the nerves of the body suffer failure. The target takes additional psionic damage from this, along with reductions in regeneration, healing effectiveness, resistance and defense.
display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Toxic), -RES(Foe, All), -DEF (Foe, All), -Regen, -Heal

name: Weakening_Venom
display_help: You envenom your foe with a powerful poison. This poison deals only minor toxic damage, but the muscles of the body are weakened. This causes minor lethal damage, but also reduces the target's chance to hit and damage potential.
display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT(Toxic), -DMG(Foe, All), -ToHit(Foe)

name: Enervating_Venom
display_help: You exhale a toxic cloud of venom in a cone in front of you. All targets caught within the cloud suffer toxic damage over time. Additionally, the venom drains endurance, lowers the target's recovery and reduces both attack and movement speeds.

name: Terrifying_Visage
display_help: You unleash a terrifying scream which causes all nearby foes to tremble in fear. The mind of affected targets is so overwhelmed that it causes psionic damage.

name: Resistance
display_help: Lamashtu is a progenitor of all things terrible and poisonous. As such, she is strongly resistant to psionic and toxic damage.

name: Heal
display_help: You are healed.

name: Swipe
display_help: You swipe your target twice in quick succession with your daggers. This attack deals minor lethal damage, but recharges quickly.

name: Slash
display_help: You slash your target with both of your daggers. This attack is stronger than Swipe and takes longer to execute.

name: Eviscerate
display_help: You rear up on the snake portion of your body before bringing both of your daggers down forcefully, slashing multiple targets in front of you. The viciousness of the attack causes bleeding wounds on the targets caught in the slashing.
display_short_help: Melee Cone (Narrow), High DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT(Lethal), -Res(Foe, Lethal)

name: Shockwave
display_help: You project a shockwave of focused power that can travel a short distance. This shockwave travels in a wide arc, causing lethal damage and knocking back foes.

name: Sirens_Song
display_help: You send forth a deadly song which causes your foes to fall unconscious and take some minor damage. Your foes will remain unconscious for a good while, but will waken if disturbed.

name: Weaken
display_help: You poison a single foe and significantly weaken their strength. The affected target's chance to hit, attack strength and the status effect potency are all reduced.

name: Lightning_Storm
display_help: You create a powerful lightning storm at your target's location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.

name: Liquefy
display_help: The ground beneath you has been altered by liquefaction due to the earthshaking song of the Siren. You suffer reduced chance to hit, defense and movement rates, though there is a chance the earthshaking could knock you off your feet.

name: Liquefy
display_help: The ground beneath you has been altered by liquefaction due to the earthshaking song of the Siren, which instantly causes you to suffer smashing and energy damage.

name: Meteor
display_help: You call down a meteor strike from the sky at a single target's location. All targets around the main target within 30' are caught in the blast radius. In addition to a knockback in the entire radius, those in the inner 15' of the radius suffer the worst effects, including more damage and a stun, while those in the outer radius suffer less damage and no stun. This power also increases your smashing damage and defense for a brief time.
display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Extreme DMG(Smashing), Moderate DoT(Fire), +DMG, +DEF (Smashing), Knockback, Stun

name: MeteorHit
display_help: You call down a meteor strike from the sky at a single target's location. All targets around the main target within 30' are caught in the blast radius. In addition to a knockback in the entire radius, those in the inner 15' of the radius suffer the worst effects, including more damage and a stun, while those in the outer radius suffer less damage and no stun. This power also increases your smashing damage and defense for a brief time.
display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Extreme DMG(Smashing), Moderate DoT(Fire), +DMG, +DEF (Smashing), Knockback, Stun

name: Upthrust
display_help: You channel seismic energy into the earth, causing a micro-fault to erupt under your target. This causes a shard of rock to thrust upward out of the ground, dealing smashing damage. The force of the eruption also hits players with shards of rock, causing bleeding, can knock flying targets out of the sky, and knockback enemies.
display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Moderate DMG(Smashing), Minor DoT(Lethal), -Fly, Chance to Knockdown

name: Shards_of_Stone
display_help: You launch a volley of stone shards at your target in a sweeping cone. These shards stab into the target, causing lethal damage. The force of the attack can also knock flying targets from the sky and has a chance to knock up ground targets.
display_short_help: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG (Lethal), Moderate DoT(Lethal), -Fly, Chance to Knockup

name: Ash_Fall
display_help: You create a choking ash fall at your target's location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.

name: Earthquake
display_help: You create a localized earthquake at your target's current location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.

name: Resistance
display_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.

name: Flares
display_help: A quick attack that throws flares at the target.

name: Fire_Blast
display_help: You launch a blast of fire at a targeted foe. This can also set the target on fire for a short period of time.

name: Fire_Breath
display_help: You breathe forth a torrent of fire that burns all foes within its narrow cone.

name: Blaze
display_help: A short range, but devastating flame attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

name: Resistance
display_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.

name: Thunderclap
display_help: You can call forth a tremendous Thunder Clap that will Disorient most foes in a large area around you. Recharge: Slow

name: Ice_Bolt
display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; her chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Ice_Blast
display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and slows her attacks and movement for a time.

name: Block_of_Ice
display_help: You can freeze a single foe in a block of ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be held, but all affected targets will be slowed and take some cold damage.

name: Bitter_Ice_Blast
display_help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's chance to hit. Like other ice powers, Bitter Ice Blast can slow a target's movement and attack speed.

name: Resistance
display_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: You strike your target with a powerful lightning bolt from the sky, dealing energy damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you.

name: Ball_Lightning
display_help: A ball of electricity descends from the sky and erupts in a burst of electricity. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area of effect and drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

name: Chain_Lightning
display_help: You can send a bolt of electricity through multiple opponents, causing a muscle spasm and dealing minor damage. Each foe is knocked down, and the electric charge can fork several times, jumping to several opponents rapidly.
display_short_help: Ranged Chain AoE, Minor DMG(Energy), Knockdown, -End (Foe), -Rec (Foe)

name: Summon_Storm
display_help: You create a powerful lightning storm at your target's location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.

name: Resistance
display_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.

name: Shadow_Blast
display_help: A long range blast of dark energy, this deals moderate negative energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit.

name: Shadow_Gloom
display_help: Shadow Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing their chance to hit.

name: Shadowfall
display_help: Shadowfall unleashes a cone shaped burst of darkness. All targets within the modest range of this power suffer negative energy damage and have a reduced chance to hit.

name: Shadow_Drain
display_help: An unrelenting darkness falls over your target, draining her very essence of life. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you, healing damage you have suffered.

name: Resistance
display_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.

name: Damage_MN
display_help: The Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to negative energy and smashing damage.

name: Damage_LT
display_help: The Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to negative energy and smashing damage.

name: Damage_BS
display_help: The Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to negative energy and smashing damage.

name: Damage_EB
display_help: The Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to negative energy and smashing damage.

name: Damage_AV
display_help: The Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to negative energy and smashing damage.

name: Meteor
display_help: You call down a meteor strike from the sky at a single target's location. All targets around the main target within 30' are caught in the blast radius. In addition to a knockback in the entire radius, those in the inner 15' of the radius suffer the worst effects, including more damage and a stun, while those in the outer radius suffer less damage and no stun. This power also increases your smashing damage and defense for a brief time.
display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Extreme DMG(Smashing), Moderate DoT(Fire), +DMG, +DEF (Smashing), Knockback, Stun

name: Inferno
display_help: You unleash a devastating firestorm around yourself, dealing massive damage and severely reducing the defense and damage of affected foes. The surge in energy also boosts your fire damage and defense for a short while.

name: Blizzard
display_help: You create a localized blizzard around a single target which affects all caught within it, dealing massive damage and severely reducing the movement and attack speeds of affected foes. The surge in energy also boosts your cold damage and defense for a short while.

name: Flow_Lightning
display_help: You call forth a powerful stream of lightning from the highest reaches of the atmosphere. This Flow Lightning causes significant energy damage to all enemies caught in its field, as well as drains endurance and lowers recovery.
display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Extreme DMG (Energy), -End (Foe), -Rec (Foe), +DMG(Self, Energy), +DEF(Self, Energy)

name: Shadowstar
display_help: You unleash a devastating blast of shadow energy around yourself, dealing massive damage and severely reducing the chance to hit and regeneration of affected foes. The surge in energy also boosts your negative energy damage and defense for a short while.
display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG, High DoT, +DMG, +DEF (Negative Energy), -To Hit(Foe), -Regen(Foe)

name: Fascinating_Song
display_help: You create a song which fascinates your target, infecting their mind with a distraction while you cause them harm. The target suffers energy damage from the song, while the fascination immobilizes them and reduces both their recharge and their chance to hit.

name: Exhausting_Song
display_help: You create a song which exhausts your target, draining the very life out of their bodies. The target suffers energy damage, followed by lethal damage over time. There is a small chance this life energy is returned to you.
display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG (Energy), Moderate DoT (Lethal), Chance for Heal (Self)

name: Painful_Song
display_help: You focus your energy to create pain in the mind of your target with song, causing energy damage. The pain caused is so excruciating that the target's mind makes it real, also causing them to suffer from wounds that inflict lethal damage over time.

name: Forceful_Song
display_help: You gather your energy into a powerful, hard song, which crashes into your targets with great force. The impact causes smashing damage, some lethal damage over time and has the potential to knock affected targets off their feet.
display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG (Smashing), Moderate DoT (Lethal), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)

name: Sorrowful_Song
display_help: You serenade your targets with a song of woe and sorrow, drawing them into a well of depression. This causes the target to suffer energy damage. Additionally, the targets are afflicted with a loss of their will to live, which manifests in reductions to their regeneration, recovery, defense and resistance.

name: Seductive_Song
display_help: You enchant your targets with a song of beauty and promise, with the intent of luring them to their death. Any targets around you are enthralled by your song, and suffer energy damage. The seductiveness of the song leaves your target placated, even as you harm them, and allows you to withdraw to use your other songs.

name: Debilitating_Song
display_help: You unleash a song which can crumble the earth itself, generating a powerful, localized earthquake that causes liquefaction of the ground. The impact of the sonic shockwave deals some minor damage and causes most targets to fall down. The violent shaking also reduces their chance to hit and defense.
display_short_help: Targeted AoE, High DMG (Smashing/Energy), -DEF(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), -ToHit(Foe), -Movement(Foe,Jump,Fly), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)

name: Fireball
display_help: You launch a fireball at your enemies. On contact, this fireball will erupt and set the main target and their nearby allies ablaze.

name: Harvest_Blades
display_help: You draw a blade of ice and a blade of flame and slash your target. The fire blade deals fire damage and sets the target ablaze, while the intense chill of the ice blade deals cold damage and will slow a target's movement and attack speed.
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Fire/Cold), Minor DoT(Fire), -Recharge(Foe), -Speed(Foe, All)

name: Autumnal_Equinox
display_help: Calling on the strength of the seasons, you concentrate both ice and fire on your target. The target is held in a block of ice and is unable to move while they cook inside the block.
display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG(Cold), Moderate DMG (Fire, DoT), Foe Hold, -SPD, -Recharge

name: Antipodal_Strike
display_help: You draw a blade of ice and a blade of flame, striking your target with both in quick succession. The fire blade deals fire and lethal damage and sets the target ablaze, while the intense chill of the ice blade deals cold and lethal damage and will slow a target's movement and attack speed.

name: Resistance
display_help: Sorceress Serene has been blessed by the seasons, gaining an increased resistance to both fire and ice.

name: Flares
display_help: A quick attack that throws flares at the target.

name: Fire_Blast
display_help: You launch a blast of fire at a targeted foe. This can also set the target on fire for a short period of time.

name: Resistance
display_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.

name: Thunderclap
display_help: You can call forth a tremendous crack of thunder that will stun most foes nearby.

name: Ice_Bolt
display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; her chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Ice_Blast
display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and slows her attacks and movement for a time.

name: Resistance
display_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.

name: Shadow_Blast
display_help: A long range blast of dark energy, this deals moderate negative energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit.

name: Shadow_Gloom
display_help: Shadow Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing their chance to hit.

name: Resistance
display_help: The elemental magic users of the Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to her own affinity, in addition to those resistances found among all of her kind.

name: Talon_Blade
display_help: The Talon Blade curses its victims with negative energy, slowing them.

name: Talon_Blade
display_help: The Talon Blade curses its victims with negative energy, slowing them.

name: Talon_Crossbow
display_help: The Talon Crossbow inflicts lethal and negative energy damage on a target. The bolt sometimes hits with such force that the target is knocked back.

name: Swipe
display_help: You swipe your target twice in quick succession with your claws. This attack deals minor Lethal damage, but recharges quickly. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: Slash
display_help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than Snap Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
